text: ninnalute mumpuntayirunnavareppealettanne. ninnalekkal kanatta saktiyullavarum, kututal svattukkalum santatikalumullavarumayirunnu avar. annane tannalute oharikeant avar sukhamanubhaviccu. ennal ninnalute a mungamikal avarute oharikeant sukhamanubhaviccat peale ippeal ninnalute oharikeant ninnalum sukhamanubhaviccu. avar (adharm'mattil) mulukiyat peale ninnalum muluki. attarakkarute karm'mannal ihattilum parattilum nisphalamayirikkunnu. avar tanneyan nastam parriyavar
